entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 this evening. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
